summary: A gold and red-ish recolor for the Imperial Armor in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is the result of me wanting gold Imperial armor, and not being able to find some on the Nexus. Therefore, I decided to make my own recolor of their armor. This is the result.

Changed items include:
Light Imperial Armor set
Medium Imperial Armor set
Heavy Imperial Armor set
Imperial Sword

This recolor is also compatible with NanakoMagojiro\'s Imperial Legion Armour Uniformity mod, found here: [url] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11928 [/url]

Currently, I have not done any recolors for the Imperial shields, as I use a mod for it. If people want golden Imperial shields as well, then I will do them.
author: Gnat008
